msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the right side; almost regularly cut at the left hand side. 3 kollesis at: the middle of col. 147, the beginning of 148 and the end of col. 148, at the payments. the beginning of the column at the top is broken and the fibers are frayed, a beginning of six lines are lost as a result of that, as well as the bottom of the column, which lost the beginning of seven lines. The papyrus has some lacunae in several places. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
